Webcam selfie stick

In this task you will use the getUserMedia API to connect your laptop's webcam to a video element.

Your goal is to:

  • Use the getUserMedia function to request a video stream from your webcam
  • Set the video's srcObject property to the stream returned in the success callback from getUserMedia.
  • Set the video's onloadedmetadata property to a function that calls video.play().

If you get stuck, there's a nice example far down on the MDN webpage linked to above.

Once you've got your video connected, you can:

  • Change the function animationLoop such that your video will play on the phone's screen
